body.name: Carpe Underarm Antiperspirant and Deodorant, Clinical strength antiperspirant with all-natural eucalyptus scent, Combat excessive sweating and stay fresh. Great for hyperhidrosis (Pack of 2)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
features: EFFICACY OPTIMIZED: The dermatologist-recommended clinical strength solution for excessive sweating. Our antiperspirant and deodorant was specifically designed to stop underarm sweat and help manage the symptoms of hyperhidrosis. Work toward zero sweat, restore confidence, and enjoy life with dry and fresh underarms!

EASY TO USE: With a thin layer of Carpe Antiperspirant Lotion you can reduce sweat with safe and effective ingredients. Apply before bed for best results and say goodbye to your sweaty, smelly underarms without the downsides of prescription oral treatments or iontophoresis

AS SEEN ON GOOD MORNING AMERICA: A smooth, non-greasy antiperspirant lotion made for the sweatiest underarms, Carpe includes natural eucalyptus oil and moisturizing ingredients that gently soothe the skin, and avoids greasiness with its quick-drying properties
DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS: Carpe’s scientifically developed formula has been independently tested for safety and efficacy, and proven to be a leading over-the-counter sweat treatment.
DON’T SWEAT IT: Full Money Back Guarantee. Packaging may vary, Box may not be included. Free from Parabens, Phthalates, Formaldehydes, and Sulfates - Never tested on animals - Filled in the USA

DIRECTIONS- PLEASE READ: Apply every night before bed and again every morning. For maximum efficacy and best results, use consistently for 4 weeks. Consistency is key. Applying before bed is very important to achieving great results because you're sweating less at night, which allows the product to have the most effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Busy bartender approved!
reviews.reviewText: Ok here’s the deal. I’m a busy girl, work too much, sleep too little & have a little anxiety. As a result the body compensates via sweat. I’m naturally a little self conscious that I smell bad & if you can see my pit stains. So I said what the heck, lets try it. I hail-maryed it & put it on right after I showered about an hour(ish) before my 6hr bartending shift on a Saturday. Low & behold, it’s none of that “natural,-all organic, vegan” deodorant, BUT it does work. It works well at that. Not only were my pits dry, but so was my shirt & I didn’t smell. I got the mountainside scent because I like a fresh/manly scent for my deodorant & if you’ve ever used the Dove Mens “fresh” deodorant- it’s literally the exact same scent. Which is a light fresh (slightly masculine) scent. Anyways, it’s expensive but I’ll be buying again.Also, all the previous reviews complaining about the container. Yes it is weird. It’s not exactly ideal, but you also shouldn’t be using exorbitant amounts of this stuff at a time. I got a good container & if you just use a littler at a time- you’ll be fine. it’s really not rocket science.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is amazing
reviews.reviewText: Im going through menopause and hormonal changes have really amped up my sweating. My underarms were sweating through suit jackets and I was using ‘clinical strength’ deodorants from multiple brands. Nothing worked until this. Found after a little research and this stuff is truly amazing! No more sweating through clothes at my armpits. Does feel a little sticky when applied - which disappears quickly. A eucalyptus like smell I find clean and fresh. I have this on subscribe and save and I also started getting it for my teenage son who was also struggling to find an all day anti perspirant option. It really works. I have sensitive skin and have not had any breakouts either. If you need a sweat reducer/ eliminator this brand has a product that works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Had high hopes
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this product because the advertisements are really convincing. Sadly, the item I got has problems dispensing equally across the surface: the product only comes out from the sides and the center is mostly blocked. I’m not sure if it’s because it’s sticky but then that should have been considered by the manufacturer in designing its container. I did experience lesser perspiration but not as much as I expected.EDIT: Changed my rating from 1 star to 4 stars. The seller reached out about my issue and kindly offered a replacement. I do find it weird that the new one I received has a different design: less but larger holes. I hope it's just a change they implemented recently and does not mean that the first one I received is fake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Carpe purchased from Amazon on the left and carpe purchased directly from carpe site on the right.
reviews.reviewText: Carpe is an AMAZING product. I’ve suffered from hyperhydrosis for years. I finally came across this product, looked at reviews on Amazon and were not too great but I wanted to give it a try. Originally purchased from carpe and I had a GREAT outcome. I’m a big sweater for a girl I’m 5’5, 135lbs and can still sweat so much. Carpe purchased from on site was great, was completely dry the smell was amazing and I never smelled because I never would sweat so scent was always fresh. (Recommend the fresh powder on carpe site, it’s the only I’ve tried but 10/10) downside is that it takes about almost 2 weeks to get delivered out so that’s an inconvenience, I didn’t realize I was running out, it lasted me about a month and since you can’t see how much is in the bottle like you do with other deodorants, I never could tell how much was left but considering you’re supposed to apply after shower before bed and again in the morning I can understand how it runs out fast. Fast forward, I run out and I order one from Amazon ASSUMING it was the same product- as you can see from packaging and labels it looks almost identical. The reviews were not good with people saying it had a burn sensation, or it didn’t stop the sweat, etc. very few good reviews but I knew it worked for me so I got it anyways. (Mind you I did order from carpe and did get on a auto ship for every so many weeks so this doesn’t happen again but for the mean time I needed my Deo ASAP!) my first package from Amazon that got delivered had no deodorant in it, an empty package, no perforation damaged, nothing. I requested a new one and it came in the next day, when I opened bag it smelled like menthol, but I was like no way that’s not the deodorant because that’s not what I ordered and I know my original one didn’t have that scent. Then I open the seal which was completely different than carpe originally sent me so I was confused if I ordered the wrong one but then realized they said the exact same thing. Long story long, do not waste your money on Amazon. Order directly from carpe website and you WILL NOT be disappointed. GREAT BRAND, GREAT PRODUCT! They have discount codes and also have auto ship so you never run out and it saves you money. Carpe will forever be something I repurchase, just not from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this product. I’ve been using Lume but it only helps control odor, not sweat. When I came across this, I read a lot of reviews and I was sold. The first day of use I put it to the test at the mall. Lots of walking, with a light shirt and fleece overcoat on, lots of people. It was hot in there but I stayed dry, not just at the mall but ALL DAY! No odor and no wetness. I did not expect it to work so well right off the bat. This is pricy, and I wish it was a little cheaper because I’m not going to be able to live without it now. Also thankfully I did not have the same issue some had where they said the product was oozing out from the bottle after peeling back the foil. I also haven’t had a problem with it leaking so far. If you sweat a ton, do not hesitate to buy this. It’s life changing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great when it's new
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this product for earlier this summer when it's humid where I live. It works great in terms of preventing sweat and I didn't have any rashes or burns with it. But they could do a better job with ensuring it lasts a while and packing.It's been like 6 months since I purchased it and although I still have plenty of product left, it's lost some of its moisture which makes it difficult to apply it. Since I first got it, it's been slowly oozing out of its container and now it's pretty much unusable. This is my main gripe with it and hopefully they can reformulate the formula so it's longer lasting.
No me funcionó, realmente desde la primera vez no realizó su función y el producto se terminó muy pronto, creo que la venía con menor cantidad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good and effective without causing irritation. Lovely scent too. Very pricey which is why I’m conflicted. It does the job but £27 for a deo isn’t something I’d pay very often.
Ottimo e nessun fastidio dopo la rasatura.

The media could not be loaded. The product was delivered super fast. The packaging was completely damaged though. The outer packaging was fine, just the product's box was smashed completely and the product was open and leaked as the pics. Haven’t tested the product yet. Packaging could be better for this price.
se sienten los efectos desde el segundo día, el mejor antitraspirante que he usado
